## LinearCardContainer.tryDeal() method

If this container holds enough cards, deals the given number to each target and returns true. Otherwise nothing is dealt and returns false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tryDeal(targets: ICardReceiver<TCard>[], count?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targets | [ICardReceiver](./bge-core.icardreceiver.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt;\[\] | Recipients of the deal. |
|  count | number | _(Optional)_ Exact number of cards to deal to each recipient, if possible. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the given number of cards were dealt, otherwise false.
